title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree – 2‑in‑1 Cat Condo with Sisal Scratching Post, Plush Perch, and Play Ball

Key Features:
- 2-in-1 design: Combines a cozy cat condo with a durable sisal scratching post to support both restful naps and active play.
- Cozy, skin-friendly materials: Wrapped in premium 600g plush and a soft carpeted base to keep paws comfy and warm.
- Stable and tip-resistant: Wide, safe base is engineered to minimize wobbling; for best results, place on a flat floor against a wall.
- Nature-inspired look: Leaf accents add a touch of greenery, blending seamlessly with your home decor.
- Fun playtime: Includes a hanging ball to engage your cat’s hunting instincts and reduce boredom.
- Perfect for small felines: Condo is ideal for kittens or one medium-sized cat to curl up and feel secure.
- Quick, easy assembly: Three simple steps with tools included; typically takes 1–8 minutes.

Specifications:
- Overall dimensions: 11" L x 15" W x 41" H
- Weight: 6 lb
- Colors: Grey, Beige, Green
- Materials: 600g skin-friendly plush, soft carpet base, sisal scratching post

What’s in the box:
- 1 × Cat Tree
- 1 × Assembly Instruction
- 1 × Set of Tools

Care and Use Notes:
- Please check the size before purchasing to ensure a good fit for your cat.
- For enhanced stability, place on a flat floor and position against a wall.
- Do not allow children to play with the cat tree.

Customer Promise:
TSCOMON is committed to quality products and attentive service, with customer satisfaction as our highest priority. If you have any questions or need support, our contact information is available and we’re ready to help.
